Text: Man, this is SO bad. If Stevie Wonder was reincarnated without his musical abilities, this is what it would sound like. This guy's been hyped by Swedish musical press for no obvious reason other than he can't sit still or keep from smiling like a mainiac when he's being interviewed. The music is flat, unorignal, uninspired and aiming to copy all the artists he adores. Elevatormusic for the deaf. Avoid. And yep, I don't care that he's Arab and that it's culturally and politically incorrect or forbidden to critize muslims in Sweden: this is ALL about his music, or the lack of it.
